name: 張彥元
objective:
本課程旨在帶領學生閱讀、理解並分析文章結構，提高學生之英文能力，透過對多元主體之解析，讓學生了解單字用法，句型，學術用語等，另外配合聽力技巧學習，提升閱讀理解、寫作與口說能力。
This course intends to enhance students’ reading, speaking and listening abilities by using quality reading and listening material including journals, and speech podcast. It will help students enrich their vocabulary and acquire key academic English expressions and sentence patterns used in different realms like politics, arts, science & technology, business and health. Students learn to listen, read, write, and discuss different subjects through diverse forms of activities.
